• Real-time multiplayer mining game with procedural world generation
  • Mobile-optimized controls with D-pad and action buttons
  • Dynamic day/night cycle with sun, moon, and starfield rendering
    • Upgrade system for drills, cargo, fuel, and hull capacity
  • Teleporter network for fast travel and multiplayer interaction
    const TILE_TYPES = { EMPTY: 0, DIRT: 1, GRASS: 2, STONE: 3, COAL: 6, IRON: 7, GOLD: 8, DIAMOND: 9, EMERALD: 10, RUBY: 11, BEDROCK: 99 };
    const CONSTANTS = { TILE_SIZE: 32, CHUNK_SIZE: 16, MAP_WIDTH: 1000, MAP_HEIGHT: 2000, SPEED_NORMAL: 1.75, FUEL_CONSUMPTION: 0.125 };

Mega Miner Online is a browser-based multiplayer mining game featuring procedurally generated worlds, real-time player interaction, and extensive upgrade systems. Players dig through layers of earth to discover valuable resources while managing fuel, cargo space, and vehicle durability. The game includes a comprehensive shop system, teleporter network, and mobile-optimized controls for seamless gameplay across devices.
